name: Shotgun Legend
description: Eugene must battle aliens and the undead in search of a truck rim, as it seems to be his ticket home.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Celeron or equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Onboard graphics Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce 8600GT or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: XInput Compatible Gamepad (DirectX Required)
